about.title: Professional Summary
about.text: Senior Frontend Engineer with strong expertise in React, Next.js, and modern JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystems. Experienced in designing scalable UI architecture, creating performant, reusable components, and delivering production-ready features in fast-paced, remote-first teams. Skilled in translating product requirements into optimized user experiences and collaborating effectively across engineering, design, and product teams.

points: Led development of Next.js & React applications with scalable, modular architecture.
Built reusable UI components and improved performance.
Implemented advanced state management using Redux Toolkit / Context.
Integrated REST APIs and optimized data fetching with React Query.
Migrated UI components to modern React patterns.
Designed responsive layouts with Tailwind CSS.
Built dynamic, data-driven pages with backend APIs.
